name: Hank's Tanks
description: My first and foremost objective was to make a 2-player currency system by using pickups scattered across the map. I wanted to create and implement a new system that can work as a secondary objective in the game, and can be expanded upon immensely in the future. The game is a 2-player tank fighting arena game in a abandoned desert military base. Player 1 uses awsd for movement and space for firing, and Player 2 uses arrow keys for movement and enter for firing.
